title: Ticket #5277: DAG nodes that are NOOPs cause assertion on retries
description:
Reported by Karan Vahi -- he has a NOOP node that gets retried (because the POST script fails). He gets this error: 

  09/24/15 11:17:06 ERROR "Assertion ERROR on (JobIsNoop( condorID ) == node->GetNoop())" at line 3998 in file /Volumes/MacintoshHD2/condor/slot/dir_10281/userdir/src/condor_dagman/dag.cpp

(This is with version 8.2.3.)

With 8.5.1, I get a slightly different error: 

  09/24/15 15:52:32 ERROR "Assertion ERROR on (JobIsNoop( condorID ) == node->GetNoop())" at line 3905 in file /u/w/e/wenger/cb/git2/CONDOR_SRC/src/condor_dagman/dag.cpp

Anyhow, though, this should work and doesn't...
